useCase.name: Manage Security in Edgeville
useCase.trigger: actorName initiates the task to manage the security in Edgeville

mainSequence.step: A communicates with CLI to protect their security in Edgeville using 'Edgeville-the-protect' action.
CLI sends the request 'the/protect()' to Edgeville.
A involves Web interface to handle the security through 'the/protect()' action.
Web interacts with Edgeville carrying out 'the/protect()' action.
